EmailTemplate.name: Global_Content Syndication_451RefocusingSecurity_AR_Q118.Download Confirmation
EmailTemplate.subject: Thanks for downloading Refocusing Security in the DevOps Era
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thank you for downloading the 415 Advisory Report: Refocusing Security in the DevOps Era. Given your interest in this report, we thought you might also find these resources of use <[[https://content.pivotal.io/thank-you-for-downloading-refocusing-security-in-the-devops-era]]>.
If you would like more information, or have any questions about how Pivotal can assist your organization on its cloud-native journey, don’t hesitate to reach out by contacting us here <[[https://pivotal.io/contact]]>. Thank you, The Pivotal Team
